item.title: I need a step by step guide on port forwarding.ill make admin if urs works
item.dc:creator: @Jvscape_owner Jvscape owner
item.description:
@Jvscape_owner wrote:

ok first off do you have your routers password? if you do go to:

Step one:
start menu > control panel > network connections > right click on your networkstatus > support (copy the default gateway)

Step two:
Then go to the web browser you use and type in the default gateway

Step three:
After that type your routers username and password
Click gaming applications put your port in there and name enable it and dont forget to use both the TCP and the other one
if these settings didn’t work for you use this website

http://www.portforward.com

You may need to make a static ip (it tells you on the website how to if it doesn’t work without it)
NOTE: THIS IS FROM AFTER YOU ALLOWED ALL THE PATHS/EXCEPTIONS!

Hope this helped you if you want me to tell you how to make the exceptions and stuff post here

99% creditz to me for creating tut
1% craditz to everyone who has helped me in the past to give me exp

Read full topic
